data.name: Kitten Burst Demo
data.detailed_description: Hapi, a down on their luck racing cat, teams up with a hacker named S4br aboard the cybership “The Eternal September”. Together they travel to abandoned sites, siphoning energy to power their ION Drive. Can the team pull off their scheme, or will the future of cyberspace be controlled by the megacorp PANDO?
data.about_the_game: Hapi, a down on their luck racing cat, teams up with a hacker named S4br aboard the cybership “The Eternal September”. Together they travel to abandoned sites, siphoning energy to power their ION Drive. Can the team pull off their scheme, or will the future of cyberspace be controlled by the megacorp PANDO?
data.short_description: Kitten Burst is an adventure/racing game about a flying cat set in the year 200X. Explore abandoned sites, and race through circuits to save Cyberspace.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 / AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560 / Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Cat Ear Headphones
  • Additional Notes: Controller Recommended
